briefTitle: Behavioral and Pharmacologic Treatment of Binge Eating and Obesity: Acute Treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Binge Eating Frequency (Continuous)
outcomeMeasures.description: Binge eating will be assessed by interview and self-report and the primary outcome is frequency. Frequency will be defined continuously (analyzed dimensionally).

outcomeMeasures.title: Body Mass Index (Percent Weight Loss)
outcomeMeasures.description: BMI is calculated using measured height and weight. Percent weight loss, where negative values represent proportional weight loss, is calculated as the difference between weight at post-treatment and baseline weight, divided by baseline weight. By definition, all participants have 0% weight loss at baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants Meeting Response Criteria
outcomeMeasures.description: Binge eating frequency will be assessed by interview and self-report. Frequency is defined categorically (response to treatment or non-response to treatment). Response to treatment is defined as a 65% reduction in binge eating frequency in past month, compared to baseline.
